|lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid=motorola XXX |default_ssid_regex=^motorola [A-F0-9]{3}$ |default_ip=192.168.30.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=Motorola |oui= |oui_eth= |default_ch= }} [http://broadband.motorola.com/noflash/customer_docs/user_guides/509106-001-a.pdf User guide] "WAPB-102G_V01" and "ENG-702-9101" is silkscreened on the main board in the FCC photos. :This device has the same hardware as the [[Motorola WA840G v1]]. [http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=5935 Motorola we800g JTAG pinout - DD-WRT forums]
[http://wiki.openwrt.org/oldwiki/OpenWrtDocs/Hardware/Motorola/WE800G WE800G on the OpenWrt wiki] :some units may have 2MB Flash and 8MB RAM Default settings (including the SSID) are per the FCC manual and '''Motorola''''s User Guide.
